titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn, Jamaica and Flatbush Turnpike Company stockholder list 1978.177
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-18T11:00-0500

did.unittitle: Brooklyn, Jamaica and Flatbush Turnpike Company stockholder list
did.abstract: A typed copy of the original list of stockholders and the number of shares each purchased of the Brooklyn, Jamaica and Flatbush Turnpike Company, dated 1833. The Brooklyn, Jamaica and Flatbush Turnpike Company was incorporated on March 17, 1809.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Brooklyn, Jamaica, and Flatbush Turnpike Company.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn, Jamaica and Flatbush Turnpike Company stockholder list, 1978.177, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Gift of John Gemmill, date unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1978.
